segments.text: I can't get into my room . I mean I left my room key inside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see , sir.Those two ladies in front of your room did the same thing twenty minutes ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , did they ? Well , would you give us an extra key to the room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid we have no extra key.So I'll send somebody to your room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , what should I do with the key when I go out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please drop it at the front desk when you leave tie hotel .
segments.speaker: S2
